title: Automate Gmail organization: weekly newsletter archiving and receipt labeling
description:
**Feel like your inbox is a junk drawer you‚Äôre scared to open?** üìß

Meet the Sunday Sweep Gmail Zero workflow‚Äîthe soft-tech hug your Gmail has been waiting for. üïäÔ∏è

**What it does (in plain English)**

‚Ä¢ Every Sunday at 9 PM it quietly hunts down newsletters older than 30 days and gently archives them‚Äîno scary deletions, just a neat sweep.

‚Ä¢ Fresh receipts, invoices or order confirmations from the past 24 hours are instantly labeled üßæ ‚ÄúReceipts‚Äù so you can find them at tax time without digging.

‚Ä¢ You wake up Monday to a crystal-clear inbox, zero overwhelm, and one big check-mark off your to-do list. ‚úÖ

**Who it‚Äôs perfect for:**

‚ú® Etsy shop owners, virtual assistants, wellness coaches, and any homemaker-preneur who wants automation that feels like a friend, not a robot takeover. No coding skills, no jargon‚Äîjust plug in your Gmail account and let the calm routine run on autopilot.

**Bonus goodies**
‚Ä¢ Emoji-coded labels ready to go
‚Ä¢ Works with free Gmail accounts

**Stop living in inbox chaos. Start your week lighter‚Äîwith Sunday Sweep Gmail Zero.**
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
